revised_title: Annual Meeting for Election of Fellows in 1880
tldr: The Royal Society held an annual meeting for the election of new fellows in June 1880. Dr. Allen Thomson and Sir James Paget were nominated as scrutators to assist the secretaries in examining the lists. The votes of the fellows present were collected, and the candidates were declared duly elected into the society.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Scientific community
